post:
"**AheadCloud NetWorks**" wishes everyone at **LET** a very happy **Holi** :)  

We are proud to announce that this "Holi" we are expanding our service outside US now providing VPS from **Germany** location. So hurry and grab this very exclusive festival offer.  

If you have been looking for a KVM vps than it is perfect time to grab one ;)

  **Germany KVM VPS**:
 
 **ACN/DEH/K1G** :
 
> Virtualization - KVM 
> Processor - 2Cores  
> RAM - 1GB Dedicated (1GB vSwap)  
> HDD - 80GB (RAID Protected)  
> Bandwidth - 1000GB @ 1000Mbps port speed  
> Location - DE  
> Quantity - Limited  
> Price - 4$/Month recurring  **(coupon below)**  
> Order - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=19 
 
 **ACN/DEH/K2G** :
 
> Virtualization - KVM 
> Processor - 2Cores  
> RAM - 2GB Dedicated (2GB vSwap)  
> HDD - 100GB (RAID Protected)  
> Bandwidth - 1500GB @ 1000Mbps port speed  
> Location - DE  
> Quantity - Limited  
> Price - 7$/Month recurring  **(coupon below)**  
> Order - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=19 


 **US North Carolina VPS**:
 
 **ACN/USNC/1G** :
 
> Virtualization - OpenVz  
> Processor - 4Cores  
> RAM - 1GB Dedicated (+512MB vSwap)  
> HDD - 30GB (RAID Protected)  
> Bandwidth - 500GB @ 100Mbps port speed  
> Location - US NC  
> Quantity - Limited  
> Price - 3$/Month recurring or 30$/Year(i.e. 2.5$/Month for yearly payments) ** (coupon below)**  
> Order - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=16  
 
 **ACN/USNC/2G** :
 
> Virtualization - OpenVz  
> Processor - 4Cores  
> RAM - 2GB Dedicated (+1GB vSwap)  
> HDD - 50GB (RAID Protected)  
> Bandwidth - 800GB @ 100Mbps port speed  
> Location - US NC  
> Quantity - Limited  
> Price - <del>10$/Month</del>  6$/Month recurring  **(coupon below)**  
> Order - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=16  

 Coupons:

 **Holi Promo (Valid Till Stock last or 7 days)**  
 > 
>  **HOLI151G** - ACN/DEH/K1G - 4$/Month  
>  **HOLI15G2** - ACN/DEH/K2G - 7$/Month  

 **Old Promos**

 **For US VPS**  
 
>  **HALL40** - 3$/Month for 1GB US VPS plan.  
>  
>  **GIVEME6** - 6$/Month for 2GB US VPS plan  
 
 **Order before all the stock is gone.** 
 

  Make sure to choose USD as currency while checkout or else you will be charged equivalent amount in Euro.
 
 You will get Solusvm access after payment so that you can manage the VPS or perform installation of desired OS.
 
 Payment Mode:
 
 +Paypal
 
 +Bitcoin(place order and contact support for payments)
 
 +PayuMoney,Netbanking transfers etc.
 
 If you have any query please drop us a mail.
 
 Regards
